pageContext.claim: “But from the day I ran, I came down the escalator with our future first lady and Rush was saying such great things and I didn't know Rush at that time other than I knew him by reputation, and he was number one by a lot.”
pageContext.analysis: Trump appeared on Rush Limbaugh’s radio show on April 15, 2011. The recording begins with “good to have you back, sir,” suggesting it was not Trump’s first appearance. Either way, he clearly knew the conservative talk show host before 2015.
